sql-case.value: SELECT DATE '2020-01-01', X'1F', B'1010', TRUE, NULL FROM catalog.schem1.t_order
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ALL (SELECT order_id FROM t_order_item)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE flag IS TRUE OR order_id = 1
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE NOT flag
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id := 1
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id NOT BETWEEN 1 AND 5 AND status REGEXP '[12]' AND status RLIKE '[34]' AND status LIKE 'ok'
SELECT CASE catalog.schem1.order_id WHEN 1 THEN 'one' ELSE 'other' END, BINARY status, @user_value FROM t_order
SELECT status || 'X', MATCH(status) AGAINST ('kw'), INTERVAL '1' DAY, catalog.fn(order_id) FROM t_order
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE flag IS TRUE
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE flag XOR 1
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE flag <=> TRUE
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id MEMBER OF("[1,2]")
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id IN (1, 2)
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE status SOUNDS LIKE 'ok'
SELECT CASE WHEN flag THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM t_order
SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM t_order_item)
SELECT CONVERT(order_id, CHAR) FROM t_order
SELECT POSITION('a' IN 'abc')
SELECT CURRENT_USER()
SELECT * FROM t_order LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2
SELECT SUBSTRING('abc',1,2)
SELECT CHAR(97,98)
SELECT TRIM(BOTH 'x' FROM 'xabcx')
SELECT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM DATE '2020-01-01')
SELECT WEIGHT_STRING('a')
SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(order_id) FROM t_order
